Description_lang: Artificer Romuul's hammer is as mighty as his knowledge of crystalworking.
AuraDescription_lang: Artificer Romuul's hammer is as mighty as his knowledge of crystalworking.

description_blz.en_US: Artificer Romuul's hammer is as mighty as his knowledge of crystalworking.
description_blz.es_MX: El martillo del Artificiero Romuul es tan poderoso como su conocimiento del trabajo en cristal.
description_blz.pt_BR: O martelo do Artífice Romuul é tão grande quanto seu conhecimento sobre cristais.
description_blz.de_DE: Konstrukteur Romuuls Hammer ist so gewaltig wie sein Wissen über das Kristallhandwerk.
description_blz.en_GB: Artificer Romuul's hammer is as mighty as his knowledge of crystalworking.
description_blz.es_ES: El martillo del artificiero Romuul es tan poderoso como sus conocimientos en el manejo de cristales.
description_blz.fr_FR: Le marteau de l’artificier Romuul est aussi puissant que sa connaissance du travail des cristaux.
description_blz.it_IT: Il martello del Mastro Ingegnere Romuul è potente come la sua conoscenza della lavorazione dei cristalli.
description_blz.ru_RU: Молот механолога Ромуула так же велик, как велики его познания в области обработки кристаллов.
description_blz.ko_KR: 기술병 로뮬의 망치는 수정 기술에 대한 그의 지식만큼이나 강력합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 工藝師羅穆爾的錘打技術就跟他的水晶工藝知識一樣出神入化。
description_blz.zh_CN: 技师罗姆尔的使用战锤的本领就跟他的水晶制作技术一样神乎其神。
